_header: Lyarde is an old horse and may not well draw
Subjects: satire; husbands; marriage, satires on; friars, criticism/satire of
_description: Lyarde, a satire on friars and husbands — 130 lines in couplets

Lincoln91.First Lines:
Lyarde es ane olde horse & may noght wele draw[e]he sall be
                    putt in to þe parke holyn for to gnaw[e]…
Lincoln91.Last Lines:
…Thus endis lyarde at þe laste wordeyf aman thynke mekill
                    kepe somewhate in horde
Lincoln91.Note:
Some text of lines 23-29, 63-69 lost due to lower outer corner, f. 148,
                    torn away.
